Module com.cab302.wellbeing.model
Package com.cab302.wellbeing.controller

Class BrowsingHistoryController

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.wellbeing.controller.BrowsingHistoryController
public class BrowsingHistoryController extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling the browsing history. It provides functionalities such as loading and clearing the browsing history, and applying color themes.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up the event handler for the Enter key in the txtUrl TextField.

    • loadHistory

      public void loadHistory()
      Loads the browsing history. Retrieves the browsing history from the database and displays it in the text area.

    • clearHistoryDisplay

      public void clearHistoryDisplay()
      Clears the browsing history display. Clears the text area and resets the greeting.

    • applyColors

      public void applyColors(javafx.scene.paint.Color backgroundColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color textColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color buttonColor)
